Venn diagram and we always say at the

three circles that the best data science
is done and the case really helps you
get there because you can actually see
each of these circles player so one
circle is the computer science folks you
know they are know about the data they

knowledge of mathematics how might you

data
analytic point of view but the third
circle which we emphasize a fair amount
is domain knowledge what do you know
about the problem you're trying to solve
for how what do you know about why this
data might help you solve the problem
and if you miss all if you do not have
in a good data science application all
three of these attributes coming
together you'll either get irrelevant
predictions you will get static research
you really do need the scouts bringing
that domain knowledge you do need the

you do need the statistical analysis all
